content: *snuggle in close with this cuddly scarf with a hood built right in hometown usa is the perfect yarn for this project make your hooded scarf in any of the 38 colors available or make a few to give as last minute gifts lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # l10722 skill level easy 135-098 hometown usatm yarn houston cream 4 balls crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm gauge 4 single_crochet u s = 3 in 7 5 cm scarf is worked lengthwise in single_crochet hood section is continued from the scarf edge sew back seam to create hood shape work edging to finish
